column1: #Text=" Katara says : " About this man I 'm supposed to marry ... Is he going to be handsome ?
#Text=" Wu says : " Ah ... You want another reading ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " I ca n't believe all these saps !
#Text=Someone really needs to scream some sense into them .
#Text=" Aang says : " They seem happy , Sokka .
#Text=I 'm going to prove Aunt Wu 's predictions are nonsense .
#Text=Hey you , I bet Aunt Wu told you to wear those red shoes , did n't she ?
#Text=She said I 'd be wearing red shoes when I met my true love .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Uh huh ... And how many times have you worn those shoes since you got that fortune ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " Then of course it 's gon na come true !
